target_group: Meritorious students in Engineering and Medicine
introduction: FFE awards scholarships to exceptionally bright students who have financial constraints, enabling them to pursue professional degrees in Engineering and Medicine.

academic_requirements: Good rank in entrance exams (JEE Mains/Adv, NEET, State CET)
eligibility_criteria.year: Must be in 1st year of the degree program

scholarship_benefits.coverage: Tuition fees, books, and other allowances
scholarship_benefits.mentorship: Includes mentorship and soft-skills training programs

documents_required: Statement of Estimated Expenses from College

steps: Fill Preliminary Application Form on FFE website
